long_description: The 3.0 Farmer Jane Wetsuit from NRS is designed to fit the female body and enhance your warmth in frigid waters. Stretchy 3mm neoprene provides flexible, formfitting comfort and remarkable warmth. Women-specific fit increases room across bust, tapers the legs and reduces the span across the shoulders-this wetsuit is designed to maximize comfort. Titanium laminate reflects body heat back to you. Knees have been reinforced and seams are glued and blind-stitched, improving durability. Large armholes enhance freedom of movement. Ankle zippers make slipping the NRS 3.0 Farmer Jane wetsuit over your booties a breeze.
short_description: The 3.0 Farmer Jane Wetsuit from NRS is designed to fit the female body and enhance your warmth in frigid waters.
